dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It includes 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is widely used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Y. Netzer
T. Wang
A. Coates
A. Bissacco
B. Wu
A. Y. Ng
dcterms:description: The SVHN dataset consists of over 600,000 labeled digits from real-world images of house numbers. It is used for training models in digit recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: SVHN
